attributes.action: No MP second home allowance, but a purpose built MP block of flats
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Say No to MP second home allowance!
No one else in this country gets a 'house allowance' yet alone a SECOND house allowance

Build the MP's a block of flats where they can stay when visiting London!! Saving the taxpayer MILLIONS!!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
False or incomplete name or address information
